title: Which is the Top app on Play store? - Quora

response.answer_text: Besides WhatsApp, Facebook and Messenger, here’s the list of top applications in Google Play Store: Gallery Doctor – Photo Cleaner : Trust me, I know the pain of managing 1000s of selfies taken during a trip or a normal day. This is why I recommend this application. It will manage your photo gallery automatically (remove the duplicate photos), and give you enough time to click some more memorable moments. Gboard - the Google keyboard: Bored by typing? Want something interesting? Try the Glide typing features. Also, don’t forget to share GIF images and make your conversation interesting. LastPass Password Manager: Find tough to create and remember passwords? Use this application; it will generate hard-to-crack unique passwords and will automatically detect the login screen and fill the credentials. (Maintaining Security is no more a tough task!)Tasker: It is an amazing app that automates your android device’s functionality.A person used this application to save his relationship. Wondering how? Check link. Pocket: It’s my favorite app from this list. This application allows you to save blogs, images, web pages, and videos to read later. Snowball: Done with jumping from one social media app to another? This android application is perfect solution for you! The app allows you to manage all your social profiles at a single platform. Timehop: Find difficult to remember “What happened today”? This app will help you out, by notifying you on daily basis.Trusted Contacts: Want to tell your family that you are safely traveling? Log in to the app and give them an access to your live location to a bunch of trusted contacts.Google Fit: If you are someone like me who always complain of not having time to hit a gym, try Google Fit. The android app will help you to stay fit and healthy without affecting your daily routine. Want to build your own Fitness app? Don’t forget to consider these 13 features to make your app popular like Fitbit. Google Play Books: If you are fond of reading, this app is must-download for you. It will let you download books(pdf) for both free and paid. Have any missed any? Do let me know via the comment section below.

It’s actually based on opinions, what I do actually is find reviews throughout the internet. So here are my recommmendations : Common Tasks : Browsing : Use nothing else than chrome(Please don’t use UC browser or other ad supported browser). As an alternative you may use Firefox.Adblocking : Chrome/Firefox doesn’t have an adblocker built in so use Adguard(it will block ads in all apps on your phone). This one isn't available on Play Store though(or any other adblocker).Cloud Storage : Mega/Google Drive/OneDriveCamera : FootejSelfie : Haven't find any perfect one but Youcam and Candy camera are good(Retrica takes grainy pics)Photo editors : This can be a long list :For selfie : FacetuneAdvanced : Snapseed/Lightroom(maybe Photoshop)Filters : VSCO(known for quality filters, you may need to pay)Extra(stickers/collages etc) : PicsartArtistic : Shapical/FragmentsStreaming Service : Wynk/Spotify(for English) ***Local Music Player : BlackPlayerMedia Player dedicated to Movies/TV Shows : Archos Video Player(Paid)I guess that's enough for a normal person. I keep more than 50 though… ***Spotify isn't available in India, use VPN if you want to
